meanings.definition: Completing or reaching the end of a task or activity.
meanings.sent1: After a long day of work, I felt relieved to see the finishing line.
meanings.sent2: The finishing touches on the project made it look polished and complete.
meanings.sent3: The finishing party was a fun way to celebrate our hard work.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the finishing touch to a perfect day.
meanings.sent5: The finishing moment was filled with a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: The final touches or details added to improve the appearance or functionality of something.
meanings.sent1: The finishing on the cake made it look beautiful.
meanings.sent2: He added the finishing to the painting to make it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The finishing on the car made it look like new.
meanings.sent4: The finishing on the dress was intricate and elegant.
meanings.sent5: The finishing really brought the whole room together.

meanings.definition: The act of applying a final coat or treatment to a surface to improve its appearance or durability.
meanings.sent1: The finishing on the table protected it from scratches.
meanings.sent2: She applied the finishing to the wood to give it a glossy look.
meanings.sent3: The finishing on the floor made it shine like a mirror.
meanings.sent4: The finishing on the walls made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent5: The finishing made the old furniture look brand new.
